collectible.title: Housepet tag
collectible.text: The bad news is that you're now Yumeko's housepet... but depending on your point of view, that might also be the good news.
collectible.unlock: Lose a game where Yumeko Jabami is the winner. Don't try to cheese it, either.

collectible.title: Mysterious invitation
collectible.text: The letter simply reads, "If you want to try your luck with a more serious gamble..." before giving an address. You later learn it's the location of the Jabami estate.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Yumeko Jabami.

collectible.title: Goddess Tamer
collectible.text: And so tis writ, "Whoev'r wields this leash shalt has't the pow'r to bringeth the gods to their hams and replaceth their desires with utt'r subs'rvience. "
collectible.unlock: Help Yumeko in making Aqua get in touch with her feline side.
